text:
New week, new question :slightly_smiling_face:
I have not found any documentation regarding what *visibility/hidden_subfields* options exist on X or Y field in a `field.json` .
For example, I know "type: font" has this (img1)
and "type: color" has this (img2).
But how do I know all possibilities for _ any _ field? For all I know there are more things I can hide/show for the "type: color"

For example, there is nothing in the fields documentation (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields>) that mention that "type: spacing" or "type: text" has the option even, but they exist non the less:

You can find them in the overview: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview>

But yeah, exactly what they do, or can contain is not documented.
